screens.title: 移动端组件总览
screens.dsl:
[SECTION: main]
  { Gap: "MD" }

  [HEADING: title]
    ATTR: Size("LG")
    CONTENT: "移动端组件 Mobile Components"

  [TEXT: intro]
    CONTENT: "Stitch 移动端专属组件，针对触摸交互优化"

  [CARD: bottomtabs_demo]
    ATTR: Title("BottomTabs 底部导航"), Icon("LayoutDashboard")
    [TEXT: desc] CONTENT: "底部标签栏，支持 2-5 个标签项"
    [FLEX: tabs_preview]
      { Gap: "SM", Justify: "Center" }
      [BADGE: t1] CONTENT: "首页"
      [BADGE: t2] ATTR: Variant("outline") CONTENT: "发现"
      [BADGE: t3] ATTR: Variant("outline") CONTENT: "消息"
      [BADGE: t4] ATTR: Variant("outline") CONTENT: "我的"

  [CARD: drawer_demo]
    ATTR: Title("Drawer 侧滑抽屉"), Icon("Menu")
    [TEXT: desc] CONTENT: "当功能 > 5 个时，使用侧滑抽屉替代底部导航"
    [LIST: menu_preview]
      [TEXT: m1] CONTENT: "状态监控"
      [TEXT: m2] CONTENT: "执行日志"
      [TEXT: m3] CONTENT: "系统设置"
    [BUTTON: drawer_btn]
      ATTR: Variant("outline"), Size("SM")
      CONTENT: "打开抽屉"

  [CARD: sheet_demo]
    ATTR: Title("Sheet 底部弹层"), Icon("ArrowUpFromLine")
    [TEXT: desc] CONTENT: "Modal 替代方案，从底部滑出，支持拖拽关闭"
    [FLEX: sheet_actions]
      { Gap: "SM" }
      [BUTTON: sheet_btn]
        ATTR: Size("SM")
        CONTENT: "打开 Sheet"

  [CARD: actionsheet_demo]
    ATTR: Title("ActionSheet 操作菜单"), Icon("ListOrdered")
    [TEXT: desc] CONTENT: "Select 替代方案，选项高度 ≥ 44px"
    [FLEX: action_preview]
      { Gap: "XS" }
      [BADGE: a1] ATTR: Variant("outline") CONTENT: "编辑"
      [BADGE: a2] ATTR: Variant("outline") CONTENT: "复制"
      [BADGE: a3] ATTR: Variant("outline") CONTENT: "分享"
      [BADGE: a4] ATTR: Variant("destructive") CONTENT: "删除"

  [CARD: segment_demo]
    ATTR: Title("Segment 分段控制器"), Icon("ToggleLeft")
    [TEXT: desc] CONTENT: "Tabs 替代方案，更紧凑，适合 2-4 个选项"
    [FLEX: seg_preview]
      { Gap: "SM" }
      [BADGE: s1] CONTENT: "全部"
      [BADGE: s2] ATTR: Variant("outline") CONTENT: "进行中"
      [BADGE: s3] ATTR: Variant("outline") CONTENT: "已完成"

  [CARD: touch_feedback]
    ATTR: Title("触摸反馈"), Icon("Fingerprint")
    [TEXT: desc] CONTENT: "所有可点击元素自动注入 active:scale-[0.97]"
    [FLEX: btn_row]
      { Gap: "SM" }
      [BUTTON: fb1] CONTENT: "点击测试"
      [BUTTON: fb2] ATTR: Variant("outline") CONTENT: "触摸反馈"
      [BUTTON: fb3] ATTR: Variant("secondary") CONTENT: "按压效果"

  [CARD: visual_adapt]
    ATTR: Title("视觉适配"), Icon("Ruler")
    [LIST: adapt_list]
      [TEXT: v1] CONTENT: "间距收缩: 0.75x (16px → 12px)"
      [TEXT: v2] CONTENT: "行高补偿: 1.5 → 1.6"
      [TEXT: v3] CONTENT: "字阶锁定: XL → LG"
      [TEXT: v4] CONTENT: "安全区域: 自动处理 iPhone 底部横条"

screens.title: BottomTabs 底部导航
screens.dsl:
[SECTION: main]
  { Gap: "MD" }

  [HEADING: title]
    ATTR: Size("LG")
    CONTENT: "BottomTabs 底部导航"

  [TEXT: desc]
    CONTENT: "移动端底部标签栏导航，支持 2-5 个标签项"

  [CARD: welcome]
    ATTR: Title("欢迎使用"), Icon("Sparkles")
    CONTENT: "这是一个移动端 BottomTabs 演示页面。点击底部标签切换页面。"

  [CARD: feature1]
    ATTR: Title("触摸反馈")
    CONTENT: "所有可点击元素都有 active:scale-[0.97] 触摸反馈效果"

  [CARD: feature2]
    ATTR: Title("安全区域")
    CONTENT: "自动处理 iPhone 底部横条的安全区域"

  [BUTTON: action]
    CONTENT: "点击测试触摸反馈"

screens.title: Drawer 侧滑抽屉
screens.dsl:
[SECTION: main]
  { Gap: "MD" }

  [HEADING: title]
    ATTR: Size("LG")
    CONTENT: "Drawer 侧滑抽屉"

  [TEXT: desc]
    CONTENT: "当功能超过 5 个时，使用侧滑抽屉替代底部导航"

  [CARD: intro]
    ATTR: Title("何时使用 Drawer?"), Icon("Menu")
    CONTENT: "功能模块 > 5 个时\n需要深层级导航时\n沉浸式阅读场景"

  [CARD: demo]
    ATTR: Title("功能菜单示例")
    [LIST: menu]
      [TEXT: m1] CONTENT: "状态监控"
      [TEXT: m2] CONTENT: "执行日志"
      [TEXT: m3] CONTENT: "逻辑节点"
      [TEXT: m4] CONTENT: "系统设置"
      [TEXT: m5] CONTENT: "帮助中心"
      [TEXT: m6] CONTENT: "退出登录"

  [BUTTON: open_drawer]
    ATTR: Variant("outline")
    CONTENT: "打开抽屉菜单"

screens.title: Sheet 底部弹层
screens.dsl:
[SECTION: main]
  { Gap: "MD" }

  [HEADING: title]
    ATTR: Size("LG")
    CONTENT: "Sheet 底部弹层"

  [TEXT: desc]
    CONTENT: "移动端 Modal 的替代组件，从底部滑出"

  [CARD: intro]
    ATTR: Title("Sheet vs Modal"), Icon("ArrowUpFromLine")
    CONTENT: "Sheet 从底部滑出，更符合移动端交互习惯。支持拖拽关闭。"

  [CARD: usage]
    ATTR: Title("使用场景")
    [LIST: scenes]
      [TEXT: s1] CONTENT: "确认操作"
      [TEXT: s2] CONTENT: "表单填写"
      [TEXT: s3] CONTENT: "详情展示"
      [TEXT: s4] CONTENT: "筛选面板"

  [BUTTON: open_sheet]
    CONTENT: "打开 Sheet"

      [TEXT: o3] CONTENT: "分享"
      [TEXT: o4] CONTENT: "删除"

screens.title: Segment 分段控制器
screens.dsl:
[SECTION: main]
  { Gap: "MD" }

  [HEADING: title]
    ATTR: Size("LG")
    CONTENT: "Segment 分段控制器"

  [TEXT: desc]
    CONTENT: "移动端 Tabs 的替代组件，更紧凑的切换控件"

  [CARD: intro]
    ATTR: Title("Segment vs Tabs"), Icon("ToggleLeft")
    CONTENT: "Segment 占用空间更小，适合移动端顶部切换。通常放置 2-4 个选项。"

  [CARD: demo]
    ATTR: Title("分段控制器示例")
    [FLEX: seg_preview]
      { Gap: "SM" }
      [BADGE: s1] CONTENT: "全部"
      [BADGE: s2] ATTR: Variant("outline") CONTENT: "进行中"
      [BADGE: s3] ATTR: Variant("outline") CONTENT: "已完成"

  [CARD: content]
    ATTR: Title("当前选中: 全部")
    CONTENT: "这里显示对应分段的内容"

screens.title: Web vs Mobile 对比
screens.dsl:
[SECTION: main]
  { Gap: "MD" }

  [HEADING: title]
    ATTR: Size("LG")
    CONTENT: "组件映射对比"

  [TEXT: desc]
    CONTENT: "同一功能在 Web 和 Mobile 的组件选择差异"

  [CARD: nav_compare]
    ATTR: Title("导航组件"), Icon("Navigation")
    [LIST: nav]
      [TEXT: n1] CONTENT: "Web: Sidebar 侧边栏"
      [TEXT: n2] CONTENT: "Mobile: BottomTabs 或 Drawer"

  [CARD: data_compare]
    ATTR: Title("数据展示"), Icon("Table")
    [LIST: data]
      [TEXT: d1] CONTENT: "Web: Table 表格 (5+ 列)"
      [TEXT: d2] CONTENT: "Mobile: List + Card (纵向)"

  [CARD: modal_compare]
    ATTR: Title("弹窗组件"), Icon("Square")
    [LIST: modal]
      [TEXT: m1] CONTENT: "Web: Modal 居中弹窗"
      [TEXT: m2] CONTENT: "Mobile: Sheet 底部弹层"

  [CARD: select_compare]
    ATTR: Title("选择组件"), Icon("ChevronDown")
    [LIST: select]
      [TEXT: s1] CONTENT: "Web: Select 下拉选择"
      [TEXT: s2] CONTENT: "Mobile: ActionSheet 操作菜单"

  [CARD: tabs_compare]
    ATTR: Title("切换组件"), Icon("Layers")
    [LIST: tabs]
      [TEXT: t1] CONTENT: "Web: Tabs 选项卡"
      [TEXT: t2] CONTENT: "Mobile: Segment 分段器"
